Hello :)

I use BDD and many other Agile methodologies as my everyday routine for development.

My clients make more profit and decrease their costs via intelligent usage of tools.

central plexus

  • Toolset for installing development environment on new Macs.
  • Allow you to introduce new developer to project in 1 hour instead of 1 day.

  • Ruby gem for making excerpts from text. Useful for creating text snippets.
